SET(TRIANGLE_SRC triangle.c)
ADD_LIBRARY(triangle ${TRIANGLE_SRC})
IF(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(triangle PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-DTRILIBRARY -DANSI_DECLARATORS")
ELSE(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(triangle PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-DTRILIBRARY -DANSI_DECLARATORS -fPIC")
ENDIF(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
